channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report E-2024020578
item.description:
Report E-2024020578

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-01T18:14:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-07
  • City: NORTH EAST
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.

item.title: Report X-2024021135
item.description:
Report X-2024021135

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-01T18:14:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-09
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS PICKED UP ON LOAD SIDE WET AND DAMAGED WHERE WET DescribePack: UPON INSPECTION FOUND AND BASED ON THE DAMAGE TO THE PACKAGIN THE ORIENTAION ARROWS WERE NOT UTILIZED PROPERLY THE LABEL WAS FACE UP AGAINST THE ARROWS, 1 OUT OF 4 BOTTLES HAD A PUNTURE HOLE FORM AT THE SEAM OF THE BOTTLE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: RED TOTE

item.title: Report X-2024020806
item.description:
Report X-2024020806

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-27T18:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-29
  • City: BELTSVILLE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: I found the wet box in the damage hazmat cage. I repacked contents in a salvage drum and submitted the required paperwork. DescribePack: The outer box was wet. This was caused by internal leakage from a loose cap on one of the containers. About 1 pint of content spilled. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The wet package was placed in a tub and taken to the damage hazmat cage.
